title: Mercedes-Benz of Sugar Land hosts Oktoberfest event on Oct. 13
title_page: Mercedes-Benz of Sugar Land hosts Oktoberfest event on Oct. 13
maintext:
Mercedes-Benz of Sugar Land is inviting the community to come out for free German-inspired food, music and fun.
Mercedes-Benz of Sugar Land will host a festive Oktoberfest celebration from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. Saturday, Oct. 13, at the showroom where attendees can enjoy brats and cars, as well as an array of complimentary family activities, including:
Mercedes-Benz Classic Car Showcase
Mercedes-AMG Car Showcase
Race Car Display with Professional Driver Kory Enders
Authentic German Food and Beverages
Decorate Your Own Pumpkin
Coloring Contest
Complimentary Commemorative Photos
Free T-Shirts for the First 100 Attendees
Prize Raffle (luxury suite concert tickets, MSR Houston Racetrack Adventure Package and more).
Mercedes-Benz of Sugar Land is located at 15625 Southwest Freeway, Sugar Land, TX, 77478.
